message.body: Brendan, serious question darling. What goes through your head right before "action"?
Haha ummm I usually just tell myself that the camera does not exist, and I try to start thinking thoughts my character would think
Did you learn that somewhere? Or did you just come by that naturally?
Because you make everyone else look like shit in comparison. You're too bloody good. And it's killing this movie, so I hate you, but I'm also excited because you could be an actor if you wanted.
I want to be an actor...I've been thinking about it lately
Do it. Get some formal training under your belt and go for it.
How can I go about that? What would I do?
Ipfw has to have some kind of theatre program, start with just an intro to acting craft or something. Get involved with a big production. Just get something to put on a resume.
Alright I will look into it. Thank you. Also, is there any way you can just send me like some part of one of the scenes you like that I'm in? I really want to see it
As soon as I get something rendered, I'll send it your way bro.
